title: SOTA to bring TypeGallery2003 to ATypI
content:
The Society of Typographic Aficionados (SOTA) will bring a major exhibition of type and design to ATypI this year. TypeGallery2003 will be on display throughout the conference, at the Emily Carr Institute of Art and Design.   
   
TypeGallery2003 features an unjuried showcase of 75 new type designs from around the globe. The exhibition will also include Letras Latinas, a juried selection of 20 typeface designs from South America. Letras Latinas was curated for TypeCon2003 by Rub
author: John Hudson
